channel.title: Master wand isn't weilding?
channel.description:
Ok, so I'm using Teh-Pk v3.0 and I was setting some stuff up and my master wand won't weild for some strange reason, I tried adding it it PlayerItem.java and all the others but nothing works, so can anyone help me on this?
Thanks!
-Natey

item.title: Master wand isn't weilding?
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

Your sure it’s not client side? I know this wouldn’t be a perm solution but open up your item.java and try entering the master wand ID under 2h weapons. (Since all other ID’s are weapons) See if that will at least let you equpit your wand, if it does I’ll help you make it a 1h weapon. Tomrrow though, cause I’m tired.

Read full topic
